about_the_game:
STORY


Remorses is a slow-paced horror game focused on tension building and atmosphere. The terror intensifies gradually as you progress the story.
 

You are Jake from Rivervalley, a recognized investigator who is curious about the mysterious. The last time he ventured into unfamiliar territory, Jake came back with a realization without his life being in danger. But now everything is different. Mysterious whispers that seem to hint at some form of sorcery are forcing him into areas he would never have thought of. Be vigilant, because every judgment you make can affect you. He has no choice but to trust himself, because there is no one else to turn to. Each character has their own unique story waiting to be revealed as you progress through the game. Your destiny awaits you in the darkness...
 

GAMEPLAY
 

The most normal thing, the air that you breathe, becomes your lifeline, open windows to get fresh air, ignoring this normal aspect has serious consequences when a disturbing force messes with your mind. Manage your resources, and use every source of light to your advantage. Search for ingredients to create a potion against the possible lurking evil. With challenging visual, auditory, and logical puzzles, you must investigate the unknown and find your way to freedom as you uncover the terrifying truth that lies within...

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content that is not suitable for all ages. The game may trigger epileptic seizures due to intense scenes. Viewer discretion highly advised.

detailed_description:
Join our community

Join our Discord community to discuss about horror, be part of the development process, and share your feedback. The link is available in the right panel.


Gameplay

Solve a variety of visual, auditive and logic puzzles to unravel the horrifying truth...

Search for ingredients and try to brew a potential poison against wickedness.

Be cautious of the many forms the darkness takes. Maintain your stealth and sanity as you face the horrific creatures that lurk within...

Use windows to get fresh air and clear your head, that's your only option for your subsistence, neglect it and see what happens. Think about your routes ahead to navigate the environments safely. Something is messing with your head...
